articles.description: Alexander Isak scores the winner as a largely second-string Newcastle beat a much-changed Manchester City to reach the fourth round of the Carabao Cup.
articles.title: Isak scores winner as Newcastle beat Man City

articles.description: Cody Gakpo, Dominik Szoboszlai and Diogo Jota score as Liverpool come from behind to beat Leicester in the Carabao Cup.
articles.title: Szoboszlai scores stunner in Liverpool EFL Cup win

articles.description: Rangers maintain their status as favourites to win the Viaplay Cup after a convincing victory over Livingston sets up a semi-final with Hearts.
articles.title: Rangers beat Livingston to set up Hearts semi-final

articles.description: Andrew Flintoff is set be involved in England's coaching set-up again in the future, says limited-overs head coach Matthew Mott.
articles.title: Flintoff will 'definitely' join England set-up again

articles.description: Manchester United will face Newcastle in the Carabao Cup fourth round in a repeat of last season's final.
articles.title: Man Utd face Newcastle in EFL Cup fourth round

articles.description: A Nicolas Jackson goal sees Chelsea beat Brighton by a single goal in an intense game in the Carabao Cup third round at Stamford Bridge.
articles.title: Jackson strike gives Chelsea edge over Brighton

articles.description: Watch highlights from the Rugby World Cup as Uruguay fight back in the second half to beat Namibia 36-26 and deny them their first win in the tournament.
articles.title: Uruguay beat Namibia after second-half fightback

articles.description: Aston Villa's women's players are "dreading" their first match of the WSL season because of the club's shirts, says Jacqui Oatley.
articles.title: Aston Villa 'dreading' WSL opener because of shirts

articles.description: Uruguay beat Namibia to record their first pool win at the Rugby World Cup in Lyon and deny the African nation a first win in the competition.
articles.title: Uruguay beat Namibia for first win of World Cup

articles.description: Rory McIlroy says he was left in tears after a video message from caddie Harry Diamond was played at Monday's Ryder Cup Team Europe meeting.
articles.title: McIlroy's 'tears' after caddie Diamond's video
